description: T.1 Oak - Reduce crown by 30% and thin by 10% whilst retaining screening at level of house behind.T.2 Oak - Reduce lateral branches overhanging the garden by 30% (up to 3m).T.3 Pine - Thin crown by 15%, cleaning out the inner crown to allow more light through, reducing any over-heavy lateral limbs by up to 20% whilst maintaining natural crown form and good balance.T.4 Pine - Thin crown by 15%, cleaning out the inner crown to allow more light through, reducing any over-heavy lateral limbs by up to 20% whilst maintaining natural crown form and good balance.T.5 Oak - Reduce crown by 25% & thin by 10%.T.6 Oak - Reduce crown by 25% & thin by 10%.
